definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, commonly found in historical and contemporary contexts, often associated with individuals in various fields such as sports, academia, or the arts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，常见于历史和当代语境中，常与体育、学术或艺术等领域中的个人相关联。
definitions.example_en: Hodges was the captain of the 1965 World Series-winning Los Angeles Dodgers.
definitions.example_cn: 霍奇斯是1965年赢得世界大赛的洛杉矶道奇队的队长。
